name: Dark mode for Google Forms (v1)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This automatically darkens websites that are in Google Forms.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
(v1) Jan 3, 2019 at 10:52 pm: The full style is now released. Here are the changes:
- There should be no unsupported areas on Google Forms. This includes forms.google.com home page and editing area.
- Not pitch black anymore to allow shadows to be visible.

If you find any unknown issues please comment. Thank you!
Known issue: Some icons are dark.

Jan 3, 2019 at 6:23 pm: Whoops! Many issues when going through unsupported areas of Google Forms (like unreadable text). Theme doesn't break the rest of Google Forms anymore.
Jan 2, 2019: First release. Not much yet.. only good for viewing Forms from Google. More of Google Forms will be darkened in the future.
